pytrackfactory - flexible storage of genome annotation data
==========================================

Dependencies:

pytrackfactory depends on the following python modules:
   bitarray
   numpy
   pytables

Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   
   trackfactory
   tracks
